Node.definition: = action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth|= person who is closely associated with God, who speaks on behalf of God, and through whom inquiries can be made of God

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= process by which humans or animals stop living

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= mountain and surrounding desert on the Sinai Peninsula in Egypt, also known as Mount Horeb (חֹורֵב) ► location where YHWH (יהוה) entered into a covenant (בְּרִית) with Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= process by which the sun appears in the morning to provide light and warmth to the world; ≈ associated with a new period of well being
= mountainous area east of the Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) valley and south of Moab (מֹואָב) first inhabited by the Horites (חֹרִי) and later by the Edomites (אֲדֹומִי)
literally: to shine (forth); hence: = process by which a deity appears accompanied by a bright shining light
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= desert; ◄ located south of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) west of Edom (אֱדֹום) and north of Sinai (סִינַי) desert
= to move to a certain location, seen from that location's perspective
= state in which a countable entity is ten thousand in number; ≈ associated with excessively high numbers by which the exact number is relatively unimportant

= state in which a deity differs from humans and other deities in that he cannot be associated with anything that is in any way profane or tainted by sin or other impurities, which is a quality that he desires to see in everything else as well
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun

= state of burning, in which substances combine chemically with oxygen from the air and give out bright light, heat, and smoke; ► used for cooking, melting, cleansing, heating, and destroying; ≈ many aspects of life are compared with fire, such as anger, jealousy, aggression, wickedness, words, life, certain sicknesses, suffering, etc.|= side of a mountain or hill|read אֵשׁ (אֵשׁ) דָּת (דָּת) with |= action by which a bird moves swiftly downwards ► in order to capture its prey; ≈ often used metaphorically to refer to an army attacking the enemy
= meaning unsure
marker affirming or questioning the truth value of the information that follows
= process by which someone experiences a deep affection for somebody else
literally: set apart; hence: = human being in the service of God and therefore set apart from other people
literally: hand; hence: = state of being in a position of control and authority over objects or people
literally: at the feet; hence: = a reference to the location behind a moving party
literally: to hold, carry; hence: = process by which humans undergo certain processes or actions initiated by (other) humans or deities
= the act of instructing, as well as the knowledge and/or information imparted
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior
= man; ◄ son of Amram (עַמְרָם) and Jochebed (יֹוכֶבֶד) younger brother of Miriam (מִרְיָם) and Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► leader of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) during exodus
literally: possession; hence: = something that an individual or group of people identifies with and wants to engage with

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= another name for Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) used in poetry
= supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity
= process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event
= group of clans (מִשְׁפָּחָה) united by a common leader

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

Node.gloss: to be alive|to become alive|to live
Node.definition: = to be alive and well; ◄ because of the presence of air to breathe and food to eat; ≈ life is regarded as more than a mere physical condition; in many cases it includes health, strength, and some degree of prosperity
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ first son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression
= human beings, regardless of sex and age
= state in which objects are relatively low in quantity, or in which events are relatively low in frequency

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans (in both military and non military contexts) ► in order to make their life or work or task easier
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= man and tribe; ◄ third son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel, later responsible for temple duties

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = set consisting of two small objects; ► located in the breast piece on top of the ephod and used to determine God's will with regard to a certain matter
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = set consisting of two small objects; ► located in the breast piece on top of the ephod and used to determine God's will with regard to a certain matter

= someone who practices חֶסֶד, who is committed towards fulfilling his/her obligations; these may be obligations defined within the context of a covenant or agreement, or moral obligations to do well to someone who did well to you before
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to put (a deity) to the test; = action by which humans are disobedient towards deities in spite of the possibility that they might provoke them to anger
= location, also called Meribah (מְרִיבָה) ► along the route of the exodus; one of the places where the Israelites (יִשְׂרָאֵל) rebelled against Moses (מֹשֶׁה) because of a lack of water
= action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= action by which humans or deities show a favorable attitude to (other) humans

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= process by which humans or deities acquire information about other humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.
= words spoken by humans and deities; often remembered and recorded
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses
= action by which humans or deities act in accordance with a certain (usually) prescribed pattern of behavior, such as a law, covenant, etc.
= causative action by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire knowledge, a skill, or a certain type of behavior
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel
= causative action by which humans or deities offer instruction to (other) humans, ► aimed to teach the recipients wisdom and good behavior

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
literally: to put (something) in (someone else's) nose; hence: = causative action by which humans cause deities to smell something

Node.gloss: smoke (from incense burned as sacrifice to God)
Node.definition: = smoke ◄ produced by burning sacrifice or incense ► in order to please God with its smell
literally: in the face; hence: = state of being located on the side of an object that presents itself to view or that is normally seen or used first
= an object that is wholly burned ► as a gift or sacrifice to God
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
literally: hand, used metonymically to denote the owner of the hand; hence: = the person who is the originator of a particular event
= action by which humans strike other humans or animals with a hammer, club or similar object, resulting in breaking the underlying bones
literally: loins; hence: = physical strength, ◄ considered to be residing in the loins of humans and certain animals
= person who experiences hostily towards someone else and acts accordingly
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= person of either sex, with whom someone has, or has had, a close, affectionate relationship
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
= state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH
literally: to cover or surround someone; hence: = causative action by which deities remain close to humans ► in order to keep them from harm
literally: all the day; hence: = process by which an event or pattern of events takes place for an extended time, without interruption
= the area separating two or mores locations
= the joint between each arm and the main part of the human body; ► often used for carrying heavy weights
= man; ◄ eleventh son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► father of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) and Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) each founder of a tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= object of an extraordinary good quality

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= condensed moisture resulting from contact of air and cooler land surfaces; ►an important source of water for vegetation; ≈ regarded as refreshing, life enhancing; associated with fertility

= great body of water located around and under the surface of the earth; when the world was newly created this water used to cover the earth as well; the subterranean water comes up to the surface of the earth through springs
used in poetry only: = state in which an object is located in a certain place
= object of an extraordinary good quality
= object of an extraordinary good quality
literally: that which has been expelled from the ground; hence: = agricultural produce
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= literally: head; hence: = state in which products have a quality that is superior to anything else
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= object of an extraordinary good quality
= an elevation of the earth’s surface rising gradually and to a relatively small height from the surrounding level; generally lower than a mountain (הַר)
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= object of an extraordinary good quality

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= a certain quantity that fill a certain container

meaning unsure; possibly: = type of shrub; possibilties include Cassia senna (senna bush), hawthorn bush (has red fruit), acacia (has a red flowered parasite), or Colutea istria (has bright yellow flowers); or perhaps this is a generic word for shrub

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
= man; ◄ eleventh son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► father of Ephraim (אֶפְרַיִם) and Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) each founder of a tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= upper part of the head; ≈ sometimes used in conjunction with feet (רֶגֶל) to refer to the whole physical body
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= first offspring of any female; ► in the case of humans, the main heir of estate and blessing
= state in which deities, humans, or animals have personal greatness and a high status, recognized and respected by others

= outgrowth of bone encased in hardened skin, often curved and pointed, found in pairs on the heads of cattle, sheep, goats, and other animals; ≈ associated with strength and honor; a raised horn symbolizes confidence and/or pride
exact meaning unsure; probably: = a wild, untamable animal with horns, and very strong; perhaps wild ox, buffalo, or rhinoceros; ≈ symbol of strength, wildness, and power

= outgrowth of bone encased in hardened skin, often curved and pointed, found in pairs on the heads of cattle, sheep, goats, and other animals; ≈ associated with strength and honor; a raised horn symbolizes confidence and/or pride
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event

Node.gloss: ends of the earth > all people on earth
Node.definition: literally: ends of the earth; hence: = all people on earth, including those living in its remotest corners

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= state in which a countable entity is ten thousand in number; ≈ associated with excessively high numbers by which the exact number is relatively unimportant
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ tenth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and sixth son of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ tenth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and sixth son of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel
= state in which humans and deities feel and show great joy

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ ninth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and fifth son of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= location where a family or household lives, or where a deity is said to reside
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
literally: to cry out; hence: = causative action by which humans or deities let (other) humans know that they are to come, either by approaching them directly or sending a message

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

= the human activity of killing one or more animals as a religious sacrifice; usually part of the animal is offered to the deity and part is eaten by the worshipers; often accompanied by the burning of incense

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
literally: to suck; hence: = action by which humans acquire possessions
= a large and deep body of water which collects in a depression of the land; containing either salt water or fresh water
exact meaning unsure; possibly: = causative action by which someone puts an object on top of or in front of something else
= causative action by which humans cause other humans or objects to be invisible so that their location cannot be determined, which is often achieved by burying them or by covering them

= minute fragments; ◄ resulting from wearing down of esp. siliceous rocks and found covering parts of the sea shore, river beds, deserts, etc.; ► contains materials for the production of dye and glass; ≈ symbol of large quantity
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ seventh son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Zilpah (זִלְפָּה) slave of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= causative action by which humans or deities increase the size of an area or object
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ seventh son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Zilpah (זִלְפָּה) slave of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect

Node.gloss: to tear to pieces|to maul|to mangle
Node.definition: = action by which a person or animal is cut up and killed with one's claws and/or teeth ► for food or in order to enlarge one's territory; ≈ associated with terrifying and deadly viciousness
= each of the two upper limbs of the body, including the shoulder and extending until the hand; ≈ directly associated with strength and power

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it
= upper part of the head; ≈ sometimes used in conjunction with feet (רֶגֶל) to refer to the whole physical body

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which an object is of a relatively high quality
= object that is owned by someone; ◄ usually with the underlying assumption that it has been shared out to that person (or his ancestors) in the past
literally: one who decrees; hence: = person who is in a position of authority over other people

Node.gloss: to be set apart|to be reserved
Node.definition: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = state in which an object has been kept apart for a specific person
= to move to a certain location, seen from that location's perspective
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action

= pattern of behavior of humans or deities that is in accordance to the requirements of the divine law and generally aimed at establishing or restoring this pattern as a standard, which in certain cases requires a victory over evil and results in prosperity and happiness
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses
literally: a ruling or decision; hence: = a law or ordinance handed down by a ruler or a deity that a particular group of people is expected to obey

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fifth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Bilhah (בִּלְהָה) slave of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of a tribe

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fifth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Bilhah (בִּלְהָה) slave of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of a tribe
= offspring of wild, carnivorous mammals

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect
= action by which an animal moves forward suddenly and with force
= region; ◄ north east of the River Jordan (יַרְדֵּן) ► at one time ruled by king Og (עֹוג) later assigned to half of the tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ sixth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Bilhah (בִּלְהָה) slave of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ sixth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Bilhah (בִּלְהָה) slave of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: satiated (with an event); hence: = process by which humans become more than fully engaged in a certain process or activity, which can be either good or bad

Node.gloss: to be filled > to be engaged
Node.definition: literally: to be filled (with an activity); hence: = state in which humans are fully engaged in a certain activity, either as victim or as active participant
= action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, and events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: Sea of Chinnereth|Sea of Kinnereth|Lake Galilee
Node.definition: = a large body of fresh water east of the territory of Galilee, in northern Israel, through which the Jordan River flows
= a cardinal direction to the right of a person facing the sunrise
= action by which humans take ownership of land and other possessions
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ eighth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Zilpah (זִלְפָּה) slave of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to bless|to praise|to greet|to congratulate|to commend
Node.definition: = causative action by which deities grant a special favor to humans, objects, or events, or by which humans invoke a deity to do the same
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ eighth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Zilpah (זִלְפָּה) slave of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= son of one's father, whether from the same mother or not
= action by which part or all of an object is put into a liquid briefly and, in most cases, soon removed; ► often to absorb some of the liquid and apply it elsewhere

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

= the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and by extension of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals
= a strong, hard magnetic silvery grey metal, ► used in construction and manufacturing; ≈ associated with strength and permanence
literally: days; hence: = an unspecified amount of time
meaning unsure; probably: = state of being strong and powerful, and therefore secure
= another name for Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) used in poetry

Node.gloss: there is not|it is not|it does not
Node.definition: = state in which an object or event is either absent or non existant
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action by which humans ride on a domestic animal such as a donkey (חֲמֹור) or a horse (סוּס) or in a chariot (מֶרְכָּבָה)

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans (in both military and non military contexts) ► in order to make their life or work or task easier
= state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= each of the two upper limbs of the body, including the shoulder and extending until the hand; ≈ directly associated with strength and power
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
= causative action by which people are expelled from their dwelling place
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to destroy|to exterminate|to wipe out|to demolish
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, deities, or events completely remove humans, animals, or objects from existence; ◄ by (a usually unnatural) death, aggression, hardship, disaster, destruction, or direct divine intervention; ► often as punishment

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH
= the state of being apart from significant others
= hole in the earth that gives access to the subterranean water which either comes to the surface or can be drawn from it

= man, also known as Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) ◄ second son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) ► one of the patriarchs of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) in poetic texts often used as a reference to the entire people of Israel

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land
= seeds of cultivated cereal; ► used as food

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of newly harvested grapes and possibly still at the beginning of the fermentation process; ► used as beverage and for sacrifice; ≈ represents the entire range of agricultural products in Israel, together with grain and oil; associated with joy and well being, and only once with drunkenness and foolishness

marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied), and also often used to affirm this new information as more conclusive or compelling than the information preceding it

= the area above the earth, the location of sun, moon, and stars, the realm of the birds and God's primary residence; seen as the source of dew, rain, hail, snow, thunder and lightning, and sometimes even food; associated with what is high and remote, created by God and bound to disappear one day
= condensed moisture resulting from contact of air and cooler land surfaces; ►an important source of water for vegetation; ≈ regarded as refreshing, life enhancing; associated with fertility
= state of being considered fortunate and blessed by God; ≈ accompanied by an attitude of admiration

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter

= a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified
= causative action by which humans or deities come to the help of humans in need, whether in military, civil or judicial contexts
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

= a flat, usually round, object; made of wood or metal; ► used in battle; held by a warrior in front of him as protection from the weapons of his opponent; relatively small and easy to maneuver; ≈ associated with protection and therefore often used as an epithet for God
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans (in both military and non military contexts) ► in order to make their life or work or task easier
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= offensive weapon consisting of long blade for cutting or thrusting or both, and hilt with hand guard; ◄ made out of iron; ► used in warfare; ≈ symbol of aggression and punishment
= state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
= action by which someone recognizes someone else's superiority, ◄ described as diminishing oneself before this person
= person who has a conflict with someone else and acts accordingly
= referent to a male participant that is addressed in a discourse
= rear surface of the body

= action by which someone move their feet with force on a surface or object, usually in a repetitive way ► which causes an effect on the surface or object whereupon it happens; ≈ associated with aggression and control
